Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.splash

Class SplashScene

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.core.YaegerGameObject
com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes.StaticScene
com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes.DynamicScene
com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.splash.SplashScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
YaegerScene, TimerContainer, Activatable, Clearable, DependencyInjector, Destroyable, Effectable, DragRepositoryAccessor, GameNode, Initializable, RootPaneProvider, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.EntityCollectionSupplier, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.EntitySpawnerListProvider, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.SupplierProvider, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.TileMapListProvider, TimerListProvider, Updatable, UpdateDelegator
public class SplashScene extends DynamicScene implements TimerContainer
A Splash Screen, being an instance of YaegerScene that will be shown a given number of milliseconds at the start of a YaegerGame.

  • Method Details

    • setupScene

      public void setupScene()
      Description copied from interface: YaegerScene
      Set up the YaegerScene. Use this method to set up all properties of the YaegerScene. The following methods are available:
      • YaegerScene.setBackgroundImage(String)
      • YaegerScene.setBackgroundImage(String, boolean)
      • YaegerScene.setBackgroundAudio(String)
      • YaegerScene.setBackgroundAudioVolume(double)
      • YaegerScene.getBackgroundAudioVolume()
      If a ScrollableDynamicScene is used, the following methods are also available:
      • ScrollableDynamicScene.setSize(Size)
      Specified by:
      setupScene in interface YaegerScene

    • setupEntities

      public void setupEntities()
      Description copied from interface: YaegerScene
      Use this method to set up all instances of YaegerEntity that should be added to the YaegerScene before activation.

      If not only instances of YaegerEntity, but also of EntitySpawner or Timer should be added to the YaegerScene, respectively the interface EntitySpawnerContainer and TimerContainer should be implemented. These two interface will provide their own setup methods. Note that the order in which these methods are called is not deterministic.

      Specified by:
      setupEntities in interface YaegerScene

    • setupTimers

      public void setupTimers()
      Description copied from interface: TimerContainer
      Only instances of Timer that are registered with the method TimerContainer.addTimer(Timer) within this method are registered and will receive an animation update.
      Specified by:
      setupTimers in interface TimerContainer
